plot: A peaceful family-life is suddenly disturbed when the children enter puberty. The children take over the house and ban their parents from their lives.
title: Schatjes!
plot_es: A peaceful family-life is suddenly disturbed when the children enter puberty. The children take over the house and ban their parents from their lives.
plot_en: A peaceful family-life is suddenly disturbed when the children enter puberty. The children take over the house and ban their parents from their lives.
